dashboard.label: Splunk Mobile App
dashboard.description: Better manage mobile access through several enhancements, including integration with Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) technologies like MobileIron, AirWatch, and Good Technology.

html.h2: Splunk Mobile Access now supports configuration and deployment through additional EMM technologies. The list of supported technologies now includes:
User experience and productivity enhancements, including:

ul.li: Push alerts now link directly to the relevant dashboard / report
PDF export now supported for Dashboards with forms
New sign-in and error reporting pages that improve the mobile experience
Mobile access users may now subscribe to private alerts
